title: CHILLI & TOMATO, CHEESE, SPRING ONION & LIME
blurb: Tortilla chips with a creamy dip topped with chilli, tomatoes, and coriander.
method: Mix the sliced spring onions with the cream cheese, half of the lime juice, and a splash of water to create a creamy dip.
Roughly slice the tortillas and place them in a large dry non-stick frying pan on medium heat. Turn regularly until golden and crisp, then place them on a plate.
Finely slice the chilli and quarter the tomatoes. Season with sea salt and black pepper.
Drizzle 1 tablespoon of olive oil into the pan and place back on medium heat. Add the chilli and tomatoes and squeeze over the remaining lime juice. Stir vigorously for 1 minute.
Tip the chilli and tomatoes over the crispy tortillas. Dollop the creamy dip on top, and pick over the coriander leaves.
Serve with your favourite beer or a glass of chilled white wine. Smashed avo or a handful of warmed black beans and grated Cheddar make tasty topping alternatives.
